definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Lots of young people have their hair dyed.
Authorities said hair dye containing lentine will be pulled off the shelves soon.
sentences.chinese: 相關人員表示，這些染髮劑將很快下架。

sentences.english: Do you use cosmetics or hair colorings?
sentences.chinese: 你有使用化妝品或染髮劑嗎？

sentences.english: Objective To study the subchronic toxicity of the oxidized hair dyes in mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究氧化型染髮劑經皮染毒對小鼠的亞慢性毒作用。

sentences.english: Mix the two, then use the combo on your hair.
sentences.chinese: 將兩種染髮劑混合後再給頭髮染色。

sentences.english: Too much  perming and coloring can be harmful.
sentences.chinese: 過多的燙髮和染髮會對髮質造成損害。

sentences.english: Result The findings showed positive correlation between irrational use of antibiotics and nosocomial infections.
sentences.chinese: 結果醫院感染髮生率與抗生素不合理應用呈正相關。

sentences.english: Employees should ensure that natural roots are not showing if they have coloured their hair。
sentences.chinese: 職員在染髮後，要確保髮根不露出自然色。

sentences.english: Specially designed for hair damaged from coloring and perm treatments.
sentences.chinese: 專爲因染髮及電發後髮質受損人士而設。

sentences.english: I had my hair coloured six weeks ago, but it's growing out now.
sentences.chinese: 我是六個星期前染髮的，可現在長得快退光了。

sentences.english: It’s found mostly in nail polish and hair dye.
sentences.chinese: 大多存在於指甲油和染髮劑中。

sentences.english: The gallic acid hair dye is used for black-dyeing of human hair.
sentences.chinese: 該沒食子酸染髮劑用於人發的染黑。

sentences.english: In an ideal world, permanent hair color would stay permanent.
sentences.chinese: 在最理想的狀態下，永久性染髮應該可以保持永久。

sentences.english: The results of coloring can have a perfect and harmonious match with your clothing and make-up.
sentences.chinese: 染髮效果與時裝及容妝能形成完美和諧的搭配。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the incidence and related factors of nosocomial infection in patients in a thoracic and cardiovascular surgical department.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查某院胸心外科醫院感染髮病率及相關因素。

sentences.english: The mean time from infection to admission was 5 months(range, 1-24 months).
sentences.chinese: 患者於感染髮生後1～24個月入院，平均5個月。

definition: hairdressing/to give sb's hair a cut or other beauty treatment/beautiful hair
